thread.title: Niocla Sturgeon urges Scottish voters: Trust me
thread.title_full: Niocla Sturgeon urges Scottish voters: Trust me - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Niocla Sturgeon urges Scottish voters: Trust me
text:
25
Have your say NICOLA Sturgeon will today urge the people of Scotland to trust her to do the best for their families when she makes a highly personal plea for their votes next year.
The First Minister will put her character at the heart of the Holyrood election campaign by arguing she has the ambition and leadership qualities to take Scotland forward.
Swinney will portray the party as trusted by business. Picture: Getty When she stands up to address the largest SNP conference in history, Ms Sturgeon will give a presidential-style address promising to serve Scotland with imagination, courage, humility and to the best of her ability.
